channel.title: The Punisher Role
channel.description:
**The Punisher**
The Punisher is a Neutral Special or Neutral Killer type class. The Punisher cannot be converted.
Passive 1: Defense Mode In Defense Mode Punish works on players who vote for you. You start in Defense Mode.
Passive 2: Offense Mode In Offense Mode Punish works on players who vote for your target.
Day Ability 1: Defensively Offensive Switch from Defense Mode to Offense Mode. (unlimited uses)
Day Ability 2: Offensively Defensive Switch from Offense Mode to Defense Mode. (unlimited uses)
Night Ability 1: Select Target Select a target, can only be used in Offense Mode. (unlimited uses)
Night Ability 2: Punish Punish a player, making them unable to chat, vote or use abilities for 1 day. Punished players die the night after. "You Are Being Punished!"
The Punisher Unique.
Win Condition: Survive or kill everybody, haven't decided yet...
Lore: A giant, hulking, sadistic monster of a human that enjoys the pain of others. It gives its victims a slow, painful death.
Comments: This adds a new mechanic, fear of voting. For example Helen Whyte votes for Thomas Bailey. Little does Helen know that The Punisher has targeted Thomas... Inspired by "The Golem".
EDIT: merc/sellsword cause "fear of voting". But ONLY merc/sellsword. What i'm saying is that we could use another "fear of voting" role.
